description: Creates a map from a datatable.

input.name: data
input.description: An object containing columns and rows.

input.name: key column
input.description:
The name of the column which contains keys.
 Defaults to `key`.

input.name: value column
input.description:
The name of the column which contains values..
 Defaults to `value`.

output.name: map
output.description: A map containing keys and values.
